about_the_game:
This is a 128-player Teams Deathmatch

you'll spawn in a faction:
Mafia, Gang, Cartel or Police (with 40 players in each faction except for the Police, who has 8 players).

As you play, you'll have multiple opportunities to earn money:
  • Break into houses, search for cash, weapons, medications, anything that can come in handy.
  • Buy Drug Labs and cook up some goods for the addicts (only your faction will have access to the lab).
  • Break into vehicles to sell or drive them. Keep in mind that any damage to the vehicle will reduce its selling value.
  • Take out players from other factions and loot them dry for all they're worth.

But be careful of the Cops! They'll be on the lookout for you and will be alerted to your position if you break into houses or vehicles.
Lay low until the wanted timer runs out to avoid being caught!

for each round, the 4 individuals with the lowest earnings will be eliminated (cops are exempt from this rule).
The last faction standing will win, with the best teams added to the leaderboard.

Keep your eyes open for Power-ups hidden around the map – they will help you survive!

Invite your friends to join your team of 4 players in the same faction and communicate with them through the in-game chat (just press enter).
There's no friendly fire between teams from the same faction – friendly faction members will be marked with a white symbol above their heads.

With this full version you can create a unique 3D avatar from a single photo and customize your own skins!

Remember the goal is to get the most money!
some players can win without firing a single bullet.
and some will try and kill everybody to steal from them.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains player vs player combat and can show act of violence (gun shooting, fist fighting, vehicle run over)

also the game show drugs pictures and names that can offend some users.

detailed_description:
This is a 128-player Teams Deathmatch

you'll spawn in a faction:
Mafia, Gang, Cartel or Police (with 40 players in each faction except for the Police, who has 8 players).

As you play, you'll have multiple opportunities to earn money:
  • Break into houses, search for cash, weapons, medications, anything that can come in handy.
  • Buy Drug Labs and cook up some goods for the addicts (only your faction will have access to the lab).
  • Break into vehicles to sell or drive them. Keep in mind that any damage to the vehicle will reduce its selling value.
  • Take out players from other factions and loot them dry for all they're worth.

But be careful of the Cops! They'll be on the lookout for you and will be alerted to your position if you break into houses or vehicles.
Lay low until the wanted timer runs out to avoid being caught!

for each round, the 4 individuals with the lowest earnings will be eliminated (cops are exempt from this rule).
The last faction standing will win, with the best teams added to the leaderboard.

Keep your eyes open for Power-ups hidden around the map – they will help you survive!

Invite your friends to join your team of 4 players in the same faction and communicate with them through the in-game chat (just press enter).
There's no friendly fire between teams from the same faction – friendly faction members will be marked with a white symbol above their heads.

With this full version you can create a unique 3D avatar from a single photo and customize your own skins!

Remember the goal is to get the most money!

and some will try and kill everybody to steal from them.
name: Loot Frenzy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GT 640, AMD Radeon™ HD 7730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 380 MB available space

short_description: Join 128-player Team Deathmatch. Earn money any way you can – steal, rob, sell – but watch out for rival gangs or the cops! Every round the lowest earners will be eliminated. Climb the leaderboards and make a name for yourself in this crooked world.
